title: Switches and Other Accessories
generalRequirement: Switches and other accessories shall not be installed within 0.3 m of the floor of a bathroom, laundry, or other similar location where the floor is likely to become wet.

zoneRequirements.requirement: Switches and other accessories shall not be installed in Zone 0.
Only switches and accessories with at least the required degree of protection shall be installed in Zones 1 and 2.
